meanings.sent1: The volleyball team had skilled volleyers who could spike the ball.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends at the beach were all volleyers, enjoying a game of volleyball.
meanings.sent3: The volleyers at the tournament were so focused, they even practiced in their sleep!
meanings.sent4: The volleyers on the court moved like synchronized dancers, perfectly timed and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The young volleyers looked up to the experienced players, eager to learn from them.

meanings.definition: A group of people who play volleyball.
meanings.sent1: The local park was filled with excited volleyers ready for a friendly match.
meanings.sent2: The school's volleyball team was a dedicated group of volleyers who trained hard.
meanings.sent3: The group of volleyers decided to have a beach volleyball tournament for fun.
meanings.sent4: The enthusiastic volleyers cheered each other on during the intense match.
meanings.sent5: The group of young volleyers practiced together to improve their skills.

meanings.definition: The act of hitting a volleyball before it touches the ground.
meanings.sent1: The player's quick reflexes allowed them to make a perfect volley, impressing the crowd.
meanings.sent2: During the game, the volleyers showcased their skills with precise and powerful hits.
meanings.sent3: The volleyers joked that their volleyball skills were so good, they could even volley in their sleep!
meanings.sent4: The sound of the volleyers hitting the ball echoed through the gym, creating an intense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of timing and technique to the young volleyers learning to volley.
